frame.name: Front_for
frame.definition:
<def-root>An individual or organization, the <fen>Front</fen>, serves as a cover for an <fen>Illicit_activity</fen> or an <fen>Illicit_organization</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Front">The laundromat</fex> is a <t>front</t> <fex name="Illicit_organization">for the Yakuza</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Front
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Front</fen> acts as a legitimate individual, organization, or enterprise, but is truly a cover for an illicit organization or activity.</def-root>

FE.name: Illicit_organization
FE.definition: <def-root>The existence and activities of the <fen>Illicit_organization</fen> are concealed by the <fen>Front</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Illicit_activity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Illicit_activity</fen> of the <fen>Illicit_organization</fen> is concealed by (the activities of) the <fen>Front</fen> .</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the deceptive activity occurs</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Front</fen> is attempting to bring about.
<ex>He <t>fronted</t> for the mob <fex name="pur">to get out of paying protection</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The action taken by the <fen>Front</fen> to ensure successful deceit of authorities.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the similarity of the event to some other event, particularly descriptions of the <fen>Front</fen> that also affect the details of the action.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: front.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: act legitimately so as to to conceal an organization or their activities.

lexUnit.name: front.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person or organization serving as a cover for subversive activities.

lexUnit.name: blind.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a cover for illicit activity.
